name: Monster Training Card Game TCG
description:
Choose one of the magic girls and start the struggle for the title of the Archmage! Gather all your magic force in one deadly attack and win! Check Monster Training Card Game TCG!

Take a challenge and start the long fight! Choose one of three classes (each with its own unique cards and abilities)! Fighter, the famous war mage of the North; Wizzard, the wise and mysterious sage of West; and Summoner, kind and cheerful fairie druid! Each magic girl has her own unique spells and creatures to control, so choose wisely!

So, show other contestants, who’s the best mage here! Use the magic spells, summon different creatures and monsters, buff or debuff your cards, equip them with weapons, use deck builder to improve your deck and be ready for the merciless struggle!
Check your skills at the impressive battles on different arena fields and have fun! Meet different rivals – fallen angel, oriental magician, forest unicorn, naughty demon, pale vampire and others! Use your sword, magic or a summoned beast to win at this competition!

Use earned points to buy new cards and unlock new classes! Reach the best results with all of three classes! Improve your tactic and strategy skills and do your best to win in all duels and matches!
Feel like a fantasy hero with Monster Training TCG: Card Battle Game!
Hellhound of Fighter, Gargoyle of Wizzard, Satyr of Summoner – all these beasts of battle are waiting for your orders! Who’ll be released by your opponent – salamander, hydra, naga, dragon, vampire, or crocodile? Get to know with Monster Training Card Game TCG!

Monster Training TCG: Card Battle Game features:
Join the tournament of mages, fighters, and clerics
Check various heroes with unique abilities
Use the deck builder to improve your deck
Fight against of dozens of dangerous rivals
Enjoy our amazing reputation system
